data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Kashima have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Kashima.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 5, Minoru Tojo signals a Kashima throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Kashiwa push forward at Kashima Soccer Stadium and Ataru Esaka gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kashima defence.
Free kick in a good position for Kashima!
In the minute 6, Cristiano is booked for the away team.
Everaldo for Kashima is whistled offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 9, In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Minoru Tojo awards Kashima a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
In the minute 11, Kashima have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Kashiwa.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Kashima.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashiwa's Ataru Esaka gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kashima defender.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
In the minute 18, Michael Olunga (Kashiwa) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
In the minute 19, Michael Olunga (Kashiwa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Kengo Kitazume blunders with an own goal. This makes it 0-1.
In the minute 29, Minoru Tojo signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Kashiwa's area.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashima.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 32, Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Ataru Esaka for Kashiwa drives towards goal at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Kashiwa drives forward and Yusuke Segawa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Minoru Tojo signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Kashima's half.
In the minute 36, Minoru Tojo awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Kashima.
Kashima are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Kashima.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Michael Olunga gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kashiwa.
Kashiwa's Michael Olunga gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Minoru Tojo awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Kashima.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Kashima.
The first-half is over.
Tomoya Inukai (Kashima) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
Kashiwa's Michael Olunga gets in a shot on goal at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 47, Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Minoru Tojo awards Kashima a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Kashima have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
In Kashima Kashima drive forward through Everaldo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Kashima are whistled for offside.
In the minute 50, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Juan Alano of Kashima smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Minoru Tojo signals a Kashima throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Kashima's Everaldo breaks free at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 53, Goal kick for Kashiwa at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Kashima needs to be cautious. Kashiwa have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 56, Everaldo (Kashima) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal! Juan Alano equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Free kick Kashima.
In the minute 58, Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Hayato Nakama is on a sub for Yusuke Segawa for Kashiwa.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 59, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, The home team replace Ayase Ueda with Sho Ito.
Zago is making the team's second substitution at Kashima Soccer Stadium with Rikuto Hirose replacing Kei Koizumi.
Yasushi Endo is replacing Juan Alano for the home team.
In the minute 63, Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Important block from the Kashiwa defence as Kento Misao fires in a strike for Kashima.
Kashima have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Kashima.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Kashiwa are coming forward and Ataru Esaka gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 68, Kashima attack but Everaldo's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
In the minute 70, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Minoru Tojo signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Kashiwa's area.
In the minute 71, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashima.
Kashima advance rapidly upfield but Minoru Tojo blows for offside.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
In the minute 74, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Michael Olunga is on target to give Kashiwa a 1-2 advantage.
Minoru Tojo signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Kashima's half.
In the minute 77, Minoru Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 80, Kashima's Yasushi Endo misses with an attempt on goal.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ataru Esaka for Kashiwa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 81, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
The home team have replaced Leo Silva with Ryota Nagaki. This is the fourth substitution made today by Zago.
In the minute 81, Zago (Kashima) is making a fifth substitution, with Shintaro Nago replacing Kento Misao.
Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
Cristiano puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 1-3.
In the minute 85, Kashiwa's Hayato Nakama breaks free at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Minoru Tojo awards Kashima a goal kick.
Yuta Kamiya is replacing Ataru Esaka for Kashiwa at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
Everaldo for Kashima gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Minoru Tojo awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Kashima drive forward but Shoma Doi is judged offside.
Everaldo of Kashima gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Kashima.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Kashiwa.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Corner awarded to Kashima.
The match has come to a close in Kashima. The final score is 1-4.
Great finish from Yuta Kamiya to give Kashiwa a 1-4 lead.
